body_html:
Looks like you have some build failures... I didn't look super thoroughly, but I'm seeing errors like:

tensorflow/contrib/avro/ops/parse_avro_record.cc:1:10: fatal error: 'avro.h' file not found
#include <avro.h>

I'm guessing you have to use the full path since you included the Avro C library in contrib/avro?
body_text:
Looks like you have some build failures... I didn't look super thoroughly, but I'm seeing errors like:
tensorflow/contrib/avro/ops/parse_avro_record.cc:1:10: fatal error: 'avro.h' file not found

I'm guessing you have to use the full path since you included the Avro C library in contrib/avro?
body:
Looks like you have some build failures... I didn't look super thoroughly, but I'm seeing errors like:
```
tensorflow/contrib/avro/ops/parse_avro_record.cc:1:10: fatal error: 'avro.h' file not found
#include <avro.h>
```
I'm guessing you have to use the full path since you included the Avro C library in contrib/avro?
